name: Prompt Idea
about: Suggest a new prompt to solve a recurring problem
title: '[PROMPT IDEA] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## The Problem I'm Facing

**Describe your recurring problem in 2-3 sentences:**

(Example: "I spend 30 minutes every sprint planning trying to figure out which stories should go first, and my team always debates priority without a clear framework.")

**How often does this happen?**

- [ ] Every sprint
- [ ] Every few sprints
- [ ] Happened once, but it was painful
- [ ] Theoretical problem (I haven't faced it yet)

**Who else on your team has this problem?**

(Example: "All 3 POs in my company struggle with this" or "Just me, I'm new to the role")

## What I've Tried

**What have you already tried to solve this?**

(Example: "I asked my tech lead for help, but they don't have time. I tried using the story breakdown prompt but it doesn't address priority ordering.")

## What Would Help

**What outcome would solve this problem?**

(Example: "A prompt that helps me rank stories by business value + technical risk, without needing to understand the code.")

**NOT what the prompt should say** - just describe the outcome you need.

## Context

**Your role:**
- [ ] Product Owner (non-technical)
- [ ] Product Owner (technical background)
- [ ] Software Engineer
- [ ] QA Engineer
- [ ] Other: ___________

**Your team size:** _____ people

**Your sprint length:** _____ weeks

## Additional Info

Any other context that would help us understand your problem?
